Component: Icons for Vehicles

Introduction

Collection of all icon-based tesla assets we have.

All icons will get the following markup:

  
    [class*="tsla-icon_car--"] {
      font-family: 'tsla-icon_car';
      font-style: normal;
      &::after {
        font-family: 'tsla-icon_car';
        font-style: normal;
      }
    }
All icons are considered "extras" and are therefore not included in the base installation of Particles. This means that you have to explicitly include it in your Sass files. 
  
  @import "[../]node_modules/@tesla/particles/scss/_particles/extras/icons-vehicle";

Optionally, if you want the base 't-shirt' sizes for icons, import this file as well:

  
    @import "[../]node_modules/@tesla/particles/scss/_particles/extras/icon-sizes";

If you are after a single icon, and have no desire to include the entire font stack, each of these icons is also stored in Particles as an SVG asset located here:

  
    node_modules/@tesla/particles/assets/img/icons/car-icons

Vehicle Icons

tsla-icon_car--steering_wheel
tsla-icon_car--door
tsla-icon_car--hepa
tsla-icon_car--performance
tsla-icon_car--premium
tsla-icon_car--sound
tsla-icon_car--weather
tsla-icon_car--suspension
